lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Presidential spokesman Frota Netto told journalists earlier today the government was considering a suggestion by the Chief of Civilian Staff at the Presidency Marco Maciel that a new multi-party cabinet be formed to deal with the country's current economic difficulties.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A sharp deterioration in Brazil's foreign trade surplus caused President Sarney to announce last month the suspension of interest rate payments on 68 billion dollars of commercial debt.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After holding prices for nearly nine months, the plan was unable to withstand the inflationary pressures of booming consumer demand and widespread shortages.
